title: Tainted
description: View our feature on Julie Kennerâ€™s Tainted.Lily Carlyle has lied, cheated, and stolen her way through life.But in death, she'll really get to be bad... When her little sister is brutalized, a vengeful Lily determines to exact her own justice. She succeeds at the cost of her own life, but as she lies dying, she is given a second chance. Lily can earn her way into Paradise by becoming an assassin for the forces of good. It's the job Lily believes she can really get into--but she doesn't realize that she may not be able to get out.Read Julie Kenner's posts on the Penguin Blog.
author: Julie Kenner
